subject: Hockey, Ice
Teeth and Dentistry
lead_paragraph: Pete Maro, 46, who had stints in the Devils’ and the Rangers’ systems, is the oldest person — by seven years — to play in the two-year-old Federal Hockey League.
snippet: Pete Maro, 46, who had stints in the Devils’ and the Rangers’ systems, is the oldest person — by seven years — to play in the two-year-old Federal Hockey League.
